name: Blind Ferret
description:
As a media empire, Blind Ferret plans and launches results-driven online and mobile campaign for its clients around the world, including helping app developers reach the top charts in the App Store and on Google Play. Blind Ferret’s clients also have access to our proprietary performance-based mobile ad platform, helping them acquire highly engaged users at scale.
In case that wasn’t enough, Blind Ferret also represents some of the most sought-after gaming properties on the web, including RockPaperShotgun.com, Eurogamer.net, VG247.com, and PrimaGames.com to name just a few. Blind Ferret’s Entertainment portfolio specializes in the creation and marketing of two of the planet’s top Webcomics. Least I Could Do (est. 2003) and Looking For Group (est. 2007) currently reach over 2 million readers each month. Both of these brands have been taken to previously unseen heights with books, merchandise and animation projects. Blind Ferret is also the genius mind behind the “Bento” brand blind-box subscription services. Comic Bento delivers surprise graphic novels to users once a month and Board Game Bento does the same with games and accessories for gamers. Both Bento brands have grown exponentially and show no sign of slowing down!
